attributes.action: why did request to taliban  in house of lord room number 4
attributes.additional_details:
To

Prime Minister ,

Subject    Complaint against Lord Ahmed and Lord Qurban  Regarding Taliban Invitation
Dear Sir
I would like to bring one serious issue into your knowledge  that one  former interior Minister of sindh Pakistan  Zulfiqar Mirza   visited into house of Lord in room number 4, and addressed  with Pakistani community  on 17th November 2o11 , in which he said if government of Britain will not take any action against to the MQM than we will  do request  to the Taliban please come over here and do our Help against to the MQM .
I am so shocked to hear these words from zulfiqar Mirza in presence  of Lord Ahmed and Lord Qurban  in very respectful place, I would like to request you please do investigate and see below  link and take appropriate action against these activities in the UK .
    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jh2b86kze4w


Suhail  khanzada
